metadata.name: Sacred
metadata.description:
There's a fire in my heart, a flame that burns 
A sacred passion, I never miss a chance  
So through the trials of life and all its pain
I fought for my voice and broke those chains
 
Although the world tried to dim my light
And even if the roads didn't shine as bright
I knew deep down inside my soul
That I had the power to take control
 
My journey was hard, and I've lived in fear 
But I fought through, year after year 
My struggles and pain will be the shining light
A celebration of hope through the darkest nights
 
My spirit will live on in every good heart 
I'm the sacred soul; I'm the work of art
For all I've endured, I've conquered and gave 
For my courage and strength, my legacy remains
